definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: The new teacher really rates with the director of our department.
sentences.chinese: 這位新來的教師深受我係系主任的好評。

sentences.english: That new detective show has been getting good reviews.
sentences.chinese: 那部新放映的偵探片受到了好評。

sentences.english: Chu Kan 8, each student of each department are subject to wide acclaim.
sentences.chinese: 出刊八期，每一期都受到各系師生的廣泛好評。

sentences.english: Your good marks gratify me very much.
sentences.chinese: 你的好評使我非常高興。

sentences.english: Working his way up, he made a few short films that won a lot of praise.
sentences.chinese: 他逐步晉升，也拍了幾部贏得許多好評的短片。

sentences.english: Their second gig earned them a rave review.
sentences.chinese: 他們第二場演奏贏得了好評。

sentences.english: City in the transformation of rural power grids are widely used and have been won critical acclaim.
sentences.chinese: 在城農網改造中得到了廣泛的應用並受到一致好評。

sentences.english: Andy Lau is a highly acclaimed performance artist.
sentences.chinese: 劉德華是深獲好評的表演藝術家。

sentences.english: This paper has already passed the Siyang county government's appraisal, and has obtained the high praise.
sentences.chinese: 課題已經通過了泗陽縣政府的評審，並獲得了好評。

sentences.english: Mao still is most popular amongst the poor and workers.
sentences.chinese: 毛在窮人和工人中仍然是最受好評的。

sentences.english: The new teacher has really taken the students by storm.
sentences.chinese: 新任老師廣獲學生好評。

sentences.english: In some organisations, however, it has already become a much-appreciated R&D tool.
sentences.chinese: 在一些組織內部這已經成爲一項頗受好評的研發工具。

sentences.english: I hope your new book gets good reviews.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你的新書獲得好評。

sentences.english: This product has won good appraisement of customers since its first appearance in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 本產品自1999年面世以來廣受各地客戶的好評。

sentences.english: Having been recognized by lodgers for excellent hospitality services or good service practices.
sentences.chinese: 接待旅客服務周全獲有好評，或有優良事蹟者。

definition: to like/to love/to be fond of/favorite
(of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
domestic and international/at home and abroad
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
(lit.) to fix one's gaze on/(fig.) to show interest in/(favorable) attention/favor
bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
